item.title: Machine Learning–Based Diabetes Risk Prediction: Evidence from BRFSS Data
item.description: Hand-built machine learning models for diabetes risk prediction using questionnaire-derived features and basic health indicators, with recall-oriented evaluation for early screening.

item.title: Obesity, Globalization, and Education: An Empirical Panel Data Analysis
item.description: Applied fixed-effects panel regressions to examine the relationship between social globalization, education, and obesity prevalence using cross-country data

item.title: Daimler–Chrysler Merger: Strategic and Organizational Lessons from a Failed Integration
item.description: A case study of how Daimler-Benz and Chrysler pursued a merger of equals, and why cultural, strategic, and structural misalignment ultimately turned it into one of the most costly failures in automotive history.

item.title: Global Production Strategy at Mercedes-Benz: Organization, Location, and Specialization
item.description: An examination of how Mercedes-Benz deploys multiple global production and investment methods—including HFDI, centralization, vertical specialization, and outsourcing—to organize and optimize its worldwide manufacturing system.
